event.title: FOSDEM '26 - How to do a Podcast with Free Software?

body.p: Bonnie and Ã˜jvind are the host and editor of the FSFE's Software Freedom Podcast, a podcast dedicated to Free Software. In this workshop they will share their knowledge and skills on how to produce podcasts using Free Software, providing you with different tools and techniques to create your own podcast projects.
FOSDEM 2026 is taking place on 31 January and 1 February at the ULB Solbosch Campus, Brussels
